user_stories.title: As a user, I want to define llm test case structure
user_stories.description: Establish the data model and API endpoints for creating and managing LLM test case definitions.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Define LLM Test Case Structure
Then Establish the data model and API endpoints for creating and managing LLM test case definitions.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to llm test execution logic
user_stories.description: Develop the backend logic to execute a defined LLM test, including prompt construction and LLM API interaction.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs LLM Test Execution Logic
Then Develop the backend logic to execute a defined LLM test, including prompt construction and LLM API interaction.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to store llm test run results
user_stories.description: Implement the storage mechanism for capturing the details of each LLM test run, including input and output.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Store LLM Test Run Results
Then Implement the storage mechanism for capturing the details of each LLM test run, including input and output.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to llm output evaluation
user_stories.description: Develop a mechanism to evaluate the LLM's response against the defined expected output criteria.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs LLM Output Evaluation
Then Develop a mechanism to evaluate the LLM's response against the defined expected output criteria.
